# kvlm-content

A layout component to wrap contents of the page.

## Slots

| Name | Description      |
|------|------------------|
|      | The default slot |

## CSS Custom Properties

| Property                    | Description          |
|-----------------------------|----------------------|
| `--kvlm-content-background` | Background color     |
| `--kvlm-content-color`      | Color of the content |
